title: Co-founder, Product & Engineering

Designed fundraising strategy and presented at Pear VC’s Demo Day, ultimately raising a $X million seed round

title: Software Engineer Intern

title: Founder

Developed novel compatibility prediction and matching algorithm that 10x’d Bumble BFF’s match-to-meetup ratio

title: Research Intern
bullets: Developed a RAPPOR-based differential privacy module for private user data aggregation on smart home devices

title: Co-founder, Chairman
